turn.0: Hi, I'm your automated assistant. I can answer your questions about List of Coronation Street characters (1960).
turn.1: What happened to the Pearsons in 1964?
turn.2: Ivan and Linda had a second son, Martin, in 1964 and stayed in Birmingham, next visiting for Elsie's wedding to Steve Tanner in 1967.
turn.3: Did Ivan and Linda stay together?
turn.4: In 1984, Ivan and Linda split up, apparently for good.
turn.6: Harry Hewitt is played by actor Ivan Beavis.
turn.8: Harry Hewitt was the second of Thomas and Mary Hewitt's children, born on 24 February 1921.
turn.9: Where did Ivan go to school?
turn.10: Like his older sister Alice, he was educated at Hardcastle's Factory School, which later became Bessie Street School, before going out to work at fifteen and landing a job as a clippie on the newly established Weatherfield Bus Service.
turn.12: Harry and Alice both suffered from Mary's mental problems.
